name: MSDN Dark Blue
description: Simple yet functional high-contrast theme in Dark Blue.

user.name: TheArkive
user.about:
I just theme stuff as I get to it, or as it annoys me...

The more it annoys me, the higher on the priority it gets to be themed!

I'll take requests, but I can't promise deadlines.

=======================

My style is always dark and easier on the eyes (been on a Dark Blue kick lately).  I prefer to have rows highlight on hover on almost every table.  I like buttons to do the same.

additional_info:
2016/08/04:
- fixed several drop-down menus and popups that had unintended transparent backgrounds
2016/03/08:
- finally figured out the highlight on the search suggestions...
2016/02/29:
- redid some basline CSS, and fixed a few things (like missing BG for menus) as a result
- replaced some icons to suit the theme better
- added live.com, dev.windows.com, microsoft.com (works pretty well!)

discussions.name: Looks nice, but syntax highlighting doesn't work
